name: Stopwatch
description: This algorithm is simply a clock, for timing how long things (for example, your performance) have been going on, or for showing a countdown (for example, until you should stop your performance and get off the stage). It has no effect on any input/output bus and consumes almost no CPU.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Chooses whether to display a timer or a countdown.

parameters.name:
Start/stop
mode
parameters.description: Sets whether the start/stop control is a gate (start when high, stop when low) or a trigger (trigger to start, another trigger to stop).

parameters.name: Hours
parameters.description: Sets the number of hours for the countdown.

parameters.name: Minutes
parameters.description: Sets the number of minutes for the countdown.

parameters.name: Seconds
parameters.description: Sets the number of seconds for the countdown.

parameters.name: Reset
parameters.description: Sets the timer to zero, or resets the countdown to that specified by the countdown parameters.
